content: thanks for crocheting along - pattern is now a free ravelry download - enjoy i am calling it anniversary mandala for my wedding anniversary this month this is an easy mandala using one full cake of caron anniversary cakes yarn i used colorway peach part-ay the yarn is a super bulky weight and it has 1061/1000g in one huge squishy skein i had fun working with this yarn and it worked up quickly using an l 8 00 mm hook it is 50″ across so a nice size for a lap blanket if you use a thinner yarn it will be smaller update i added additional rounds for an aran/worsted version to reach about 56 142 cm pattern support on my facebook group crochet-a-long with julieanny and on my ravelry board julie yeager designs
